issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
This is a regression.

Description:
1.Build the KS specifically for BB (got it from Russ) to the BB simulator.
2.Go to controls tab. 
3.Tap on button states table view row.

Actual Result:
1.Nothing happens after tapping on the button states table view row.

Expected Result:
1.We should be able to launch the button states test.
fields.summary: BlackBerry : KS : Clicking on button states in controls tab does not do open anything.

Thus closing.
